title: INtopBackup
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Passengers evacuate onto wing of burning American Airlines jet
items.description: Footage shows passengers huddled on the wing of the commercial airliner, which was on the tarmac, as flames burn under the aircraft.

items.title: A 2nd judge orders thousands of fired federal employees temporarily reinstated
items.description: A federal judge in Maryland found the Trump administration acted unlawfully in firing thousands of federal employees by not first notifying states.

items.title: (Don't) click here to pay your tolls: How you can stop spam texts
items.description: "Smishing" scams aim to compromise your data and pilfer money. And if you think the problem is getting worse, you're right.

items.title: Putin sets out conditions for Ukraine ceasefire
items.description: The Russian president agrees fighting must end, but calls for the removal of the "root causes" of the war he launched.

items.title: 3/13: CBS Evening News Plus
items.description: Changes to Justice Department’s Civil Rights Division under Trump; Reporter’s notebook: Reexamining the Swiss cheese model

items.title: New tariffs on U.S. wine industry are a "massive problem," says one wine trade group president

items.title: High stakes as China hosts Iran and Russia for nuclear talks
items.description: The meeting comes as a deal to limit Iran's nuclear programme expires later this year.

items.title: Big March storm system threatens US with tornadoes, blizzards and wildfire risk
items.description: A sweeping storm system moving across the U.S. threatens to bring tornadoes, blizzards and possibly wildfires to different regions of the country.

items.title: How disease detectives are hunting for viruses at major U.S. airports
items.description: A CDC program tests wastewater from airplanes, looking for pathogens that may have hitched a ride with passengers on long-haul international flights.

items.title: Syria leader signs temporary constitution for five-year transition
items.description: The document enshrines separation of powers and guarantees women's rights, freedom of expression and media freedom.

items.title: USPS agrees to work with DOGE on reform, planning to cut 10,000 workers
